NK040(thi)028:3: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad dang //
NK040(thi)028:4: yum chen sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa las //
NK040(thi)028:5: sras mchog rigs lnga'i ki la ya //
NK040(thi)028:6: mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum //
NK040(thi)028:7: zur brgyad gzi byin dbal dang ldan //
NK040(thi)028:8: dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi //
NK040(thi)028:9: lus ngag yid la gdab byas nas //
NK040(thi)028:10: rdul phran bzhin du brlag par mdzod //
NK040(thi)028:11: bud+d+ha badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma ki li k+ai la ya
NK040(thi)028:12: dgra bgegs sarba sha trum ma ra ya h'u phata
